data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Shimizu.
In the minute 4, It's a goal kick for the away team in Shizuoka.
Shimizu's Junior Dutra gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Kashiwa defender.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Akihiko Ikeuchi.
In the minute 6, In Shizuoka Shimizu attack through Carlinhos Junior. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Kashiwa at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Kashiwa have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Kashiwa in the half of Shimizu.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Shimizu's half.
Kashiwa's Sachiro Toshima breaks free at IAI Stadium Nihondaira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 11, Akihiko Ikeuchi awards Shimizu a goal kick.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
Kashiwa are coming forward and Ataru Esaka gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 12, Shimizu have a goal kick.
Throw-in Shimizu.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 14, Free kick Kashiwa.
Shimizu needs to be cautious. Kashiwa have an attacking throw-in.
Jiro Kamata for Kashiwa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 15, Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
Shimizu have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Kashiwa in the half of Shimizu.
At IAI Stadium Nihondaira, Yugo Tatsuta has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In Shizuoka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 23, Shimizu's Ryo Okui gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Shizuoka.
Shimizu to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
In the minute 27, Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Shimizu.
Goal kick for Kashiwa at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
In the minute 28, Free kick Shimizu.
Akihiko Ikeuchi awards Shimizu a goal kick.
Kashiwa push forward at IAI Stadium Nihondaira and Richardson gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Shimizu defence.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Kashiwa in the half of Shimizu.
Goal! Kashiwa have got their heads in front thanks to a Hiroto Goya strike.
That's a fine assist from Hiromu Mitsumaru.
In the minute 38, Goal! Kashiwa extend their lead to 0-2 through Ataru Esaka.
Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 42, Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a throw-in for Kashiwa, close to Shimizu's area.
Throw-in for Kashiwa close to the penalty box.
Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Akihiko Ikeuchi.
In the minute 44, Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Kashiwa.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a Shimizu throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
In Shizuoka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hiroto Goya of Kashiwa gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 45, Shimizu have a goal kick.
The first-half has come to a close in Shizuoka.
Keita Nakamura is booked for the home team.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
Kashiwa's Hiroto Goya misses with an attempt on goal.
Akihiko Ikeuchi awards Shimizu a goal kick.
In the minute 48, Renato Augusto gets his shot on target but fails to score for Shimizu.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Akihiko Ikeuchi.
Shimizu to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
In the minute 50, Can Shimizu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashiwa's half?
Shimizu are pushing forward but Shota Kaneko's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Kashiwa at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 51, In Shizuoka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Richardson (Kashiwa) has received a yellow card from Akihiko Ikeuchi.
In the minute 52, Akihiko Ikeuchi awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Masatoshi Mihara is on a sub for Richardson for Kashiwa.
In the minute 54, Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Shizuoka.
Keita Nakamura's header is off-target for Shimizu.
In the minute 56, Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
In Shizuoka Kashiwa attack through Ataru Esaka. The finish is off target, however.
Shimizu have a goal kick.
In the minute 58, Yusuke Goto is replacing Keita Nakamura for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Peter Cklamovski is making the team's second substitution at IAI Stadium Nihondaira with Kenta Nishizawa replacing Shota Kaneko.
Goal kick for Kashiwa at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 61, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Kosuke Nakamura.
Haruhiko Takimoto (Kashiwa) has replaced the possibly injured Kosuke Nakamura.
Important block from the Shimizu defence as Hiroto Goya fires in a strike for Kashiwa.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 68, Shimizu pushes forward through Yusuke Goto, whose finish on goal is saved.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Shizuoka.
Free kick Kashiwa.
In the minute 71, Valdo (Shimizu) has received a first yellow card.
At IAI Stadium Nihondaira, Kashiwa are penalized for being offside.
Shimizu to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
In the minute 73, Ataru Esaka (Kashiwa) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
In the minute 75, Yusuke Goto for Shimizu drives towards goal at IAI Stadium Nihondaira. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Akihiko Ikeuchi.
Shimizu advance rapidly upfield but Akihiko Ikeuchi blows for offside.
Free kick for Kashiwa in the half of Shimizu.
In the minute 77, Haruhiko Takimoto (Kashiwa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Kashiwa in Shizuoka.
In the minute 78, Ryo Takeuchi for Shimizu has been booked by Akihiko Ikeuchi and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Kashiwa at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Ataru Esaka for Kashiwa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Akihiko Ikeuchi awards Shimizu a goal kick.
In the minute 80, Shimizu's Carlinhos Junior breaks free at IAI Stadium Nihondaira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Kashiwa at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Can Shimizu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashiwa's half?
In the minute 81, Shimizu are coming forward and Carlinhos Junior gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Akihiko Ikeuchi awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Shizuoka.
In the minute 83, Shimizu drives forward and Junior Dutra gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Akihiko Ikeuchi.
Throw-in Kashiwa.
In the minute 84, Hayato Nakama is replacing Naoki Kawaguchi for the away team.
Kashiwa make their fourth substitution with Yusuke Kobayashi replacing Hidekazu Otani.
Kashiwa will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Shimizu.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Can Shimizu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashiwa's half?
Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Shimizu are on the attack at IAI Stadium Nihondaira, where Junior Dutra is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
In the minute 88, Sachiro Toshima (Kashiwa) gets a yellow card.
Valdo (Shimizu) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 89, Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Shimizu.
8 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Shizuoka.
Shimizu have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Kashiwa.
Shimizu's Renato Augusto attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Akihiko Ikeuchi.
Throw-in high up the field for Kashiwa in Shizuoka.
Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Shizuoka.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-2.
Kashiwa's Hayato Nakama has been booked in Shizuoka.
Carlinhos Junior (Shimizu) strikes with a header to reduce the deficit to 1-2 at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
